snippet: Republicans are yet again stalling the extension of the payroll tax cut with extraneous demands and political ploys.
abstract: Editorial calls on Congressional Republicans to extend the payroll tax cut for a full year, contending that failure to do so will reduce growth and derail a slow-moving economic recovery; notes Republicans' current tactic is to attach extraneous, ideological provisions to the cut in order to appear as if they are not acquiescing to Pres Obama in an election year.
lead_paragraph: Republicans are yet again stalling the extension of the payroll tax cut with extraneous demands and political ploys.
